unit.catch_line: Products Containing Mephedrone, Methylenedioxypyrovalerone (Mdpv) Or Any Other Chemical Derivative Of Methcathinone – Sale And Use Prohibited.

dublin_core.Title: Products Containing Mephedrone, Methylenedioxypyrovalerone (Mdpv) Or Any Other Chemical Derivative Of Methcathinone – Sale And Use Prohibited.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
PRODUCTS CONTAINING MEPHEDRONE, METHYLENEDIOXYPYROVALERONE (MDPV) OR ANY OTHER CHEMICAL DERIVATIVE OF METHCATHINONE – SALE AND USE PROHIBITED. (§ 46.20)
